periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 83 in the afternoon. South southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Patchy Fog
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then patchy fog. Partly cloudy, with a low around 68. South southwest wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
